# File lib/openid/consumer.rb, line 725
    def initialize(assoc, nonce, service)
      super(SUCCESS)
      @service = service
      @server_id = service.server_id
      @server_url = service.server_url
      @identity_url = service.consumer_id
      @extra_args = {}
      @return_to_args = {'nonce' => nonce}

      @assoc = assoc
      @nonce = nonce
    end
